1.title: Backend Development for eCommerce Platform
1.description: Developed RESTful APIs for handling user management, product listings, and order processing for an eCommerce application.

2.title: Mobile App Development for Fitness Tracker
2.description: Built a cross-platform mobile app for tracking fitness routines, logging workouts, and monitoring progress over time.

3.title: Data Analysis on Social Media Trends
3.description: Conducted exploratory data analysis on social media interactions to identify trends and patterns in user engagement and sentiment.

4.title: Recommendation Engine for Online Store
4.description: Designed a collaborative filtering recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on browsing history and preferences.

5.title: Building Real-time Chat Application
5.description: Implemented a web-based real-time chat application with individual and group messaging features.

6.title: Image Processing for Object Detection
6.description: Created an image processing pipeline to detect and classify objects in real-time using pre-trained convolutional neural networks.

7.title: Sentiment Analysis of Movie Reviews
7.description: Developed a natural language processing model to classify movie reviews into positive and negative sentiments.

8.title: IoT-Based Smart Home System
8.description: Developed a prototype for a smart home system that allows users to control lighting, temperature, and security remotely.

9.title: Customer Segmentation for Retail Data
9.description: Utilized clustering techniques to segment customers based on purchase behavior, improving targeted marketing efforts.

10.title: Financial Forecasting with Time Series Analysis
10.description: Analyzed historical financial data and developed models to forecast stock prices using ARIMA and LSTM models.

11.title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
11.description: Created a web-based interactive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing key business metrics and KPIs.

12.title: Optimizing SQL Queries for Performance
12.description: Analyzed and optimized complex SQL queries for improved performance on large datasets in a relational database.

13.title: Voice Recognition System Development
13.description: Developed a basic voice recognition system for identifying speaker commands and translating them into actions.

14.title: Simulation of Autonomous Vehicles in Urban Traffic
14.description: Simulated urban traffic scenarios to analyze autonomous vehicle behavior and optimize route planning algorithms.
